name: Clockwork Soul
description: The cosmic force of order infuses your magic, tying you to Mechanus and its precise calculations.

1.name: Clockwork Magic
1.description: Gain extra spells that don't count against spells known; they can be replaced with abjuration or transmutation spells.

1.name: Restore Balance
1.description: As a reaction, cancel advantage or disadvantage on a roll within 60 feet a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

6.name: Bastion of Law
6.description: As an action, spend 1-5 sorcery points to create a ward of d8s around a creature that reduces incoming damage.

14.name: Trance of Order
14.description: Bonus action to enter a state for 1 minute where attack rolls against you can't gain advantage and rolls of 9 or lower on your d20 count as 10.

18.name: Clockwork Cavalcade
18.description: Summon spirits of order to heal, repair, and end spells in a 30-foot cube once per long rest or by spending 7 sorcery points.
